page.title: 12People's Jobs in Kinoulton
page.content: We collected{questionnaires}from parents of 20 children asking them about their jobs.With the information we were able to find that the average distance travelled was 15.6 miles daily.The average hours worked in a week was 44.27. We went round the school asking all the children who lived in our area what their parents' jobs were.Some we found were quite interesting-one person works in a firm manufacturing scientific instruments, another makes electric generators, a few people work in other countries. With this new information we worked out percentages-{22%}public services, {26%}managers,{12%}engineers,{8%}build- ers,{18%}salesmen,{8%}others. What we found strange was, though we live in a rural area, only{6%}are farmers where- as 50 years ago most people would have worked on the land or locally.
